99-0421 (La. 4/1/99)

August RICHARD v. J. MACKIE ROOFING, INC. No. 99-C-0421. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Richard, August; — Plaintiff(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Office of Workers Compensation District 8 Number 95-03195; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98CA-0940

Denied.

VICTORY, J. not on panel.
